note.p: Russian botanist and painter. Masters degree, University of Dorpat, 1866. Studied in Würzburg and Heidelberg, 1871–5. Doctorate in botany; professor of plant physiology, Novorossia University, Odessa, 1875–9. Moved to Venice in 1880, after which he worked as a watercolourist, signing himself Roussoff.
Искусство и архитектура русского зарубежья (Art and architecture of Russians abroad), www.artrz.ru/menu/1804645950/1804782980.html (accessed 8 February 2018)
